subject: SUPREME COURT OF EUROPE COUNTR
body:
SUPREME COURT OF EUROPE COUNTRY
.
 Address: 1 First St NE, 
Washington
, DC 20543, USA. From:john glover,
Chief Justice of
 the Supreme Court of the United States.
 Good day to you:
 I am Lord john glover. The Chief Justice of United Kingdom. I am
writing to inform you
 that your Compensation Fund File worth the total sum of EURO
810,5.Million has just been
 brought to my desk for cancellation due to your inability to comply to
 the instructions given to
 you by EURO BANK AND WORD BANK to secure your
 Fund Release Approval Order Certificate (RAOC) and Affidavit of Claim
 Certificate for Legal Cover/
 Protection of EURO 10,5Million.
 However, due to humanitarian ground and sympathy and because i don't
 want your payment cancel so i
 immediately called up the president to explain your matter to him as
 regards your payment and he
 personally called up a meeting which was resolved that the payment
 charges of 700 Euro will be
 reduced to 300 Euro which it's barest menial in order to enable you
 afford to pay the fee so
 that your FUND will be delivery to your home address by Government
 Authority Diplomatic Agent to make
 sure that you did not pay any fees again and your delivery Fund
 Package will not be hold by any
 power or force again and your delivery will be done within 5 hours you
 send the only fee 300 Euro today.
 To this end it will interest you to know that every and any ee/charges
 required of you have been
 reduced to only the sum of 300.00 Euro this step is in order to
 enable you pay the money so
 that your Fund release approval order certificate (RAOC) and Affidavit
 of Claim Certificate will
 be procured and acquired in other to enable the speedy accelerated
 delivery of your Euro 10.5. Million to your home address within 5
hours today from my office.
 Please we want you to know that you have from now till tomorrow
 morning to effect the required
 payment so we can clear, release and effect the delivery, so 
we
advice you to pay the 300 And You
 are required to send the fee by getting iTunes gift card or Google
play gift cards Or
 steam wallet gift cards or bitcon and respond
 back to us with the pictures for the confirmation to enable us process
 for this delivery , Get the
 gift cards immediately after reading this and respond back to me with
 the pictures for the
 confirmation
 After payment has been made kindly send reconfirm to us your correct
 home address for your 5 hours
 delivery today OK.
 Your Full Name :...........
 Phone Number:...........
 Home address:........
 Your ID card if any.......
 We want you to know that we are indeed very sorry for any
 inconveniences any delay this must have
 caused you in having your fund delivered to you long before now. You
 will never ever regret paying
 the fee. This is a promise to you after all your pains in the past as
 we are here to serve you as
 our word is our bond to you.
 Thank you for your understanding. May God bless you and bless the
 EUROPE.
 Yours Truly In Service,
 Lord john glover .
 CHIEF JUSTICE OF THE SUPREME COURT OF EUROPE .
 URGENT ALERT; PLEASE READ IS VERY URGENT!

subject: Re: SUPREME COURT OF EUROPE COUNTR
body:
Dear Lord John Glover,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the fund file. I appreciate your efforts and the reduction of the payment charges. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come into existence and why has it been assigned to me? 

Secondly, you mentioned that the payment can be made through gift cards or Bitcoin. Could you please explain why these specific methods are preferred?

Lastly, I would like to know what guarantees there are for the safety of my funds once they are delivered.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Stewart
